postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
We are launching a New website TheNewMummy.co , and would like to hear from Pregnant or breastfeeding mothers!. 
 
We are looking for mothers or mothers to be,  to give their experience with their pregnancy and breastfeeding, to help and educate other mothers and mothers to be. 
 
TheNewMummy.co is a website where soon to be and new mothers get all the information they need about pregnancy and being a new mother, based on experience shared by other mothers. 
 
The Job Offered: 
 
We are looking for soon to be mothers, as well as new mothers who are also breastfeeding to share their experience on pregnancy, birth and parenthood. 
 
You will simply answer a set of questions, and then tell us your experience of being a mother/breastfeeding, or being pregnant. 
 
It will take no more than 1 hour and you will be paid for your time. 
 
The Pay: 
 
We are paying a minimum of $80 for 1 hour but if you agree to share your experience on video, for the website, you will be paid up to $300 for 1 hour of your time. 
 
Please get in contact if you are interested. There is a maximum of 10 spots available for this opportunity. 
 
We look forward to hearing from you! 
 
TheNewMummy.co Team
title: Pregnant / Breastfeeding Moms - Get paid $300 to share your experience

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
**MUST HAVE AUSTRALIAN PAYROLL EXPERIENCE (END-TO-END PROCESSING)** 
 
Company Overview 
 
Headquartered in Dallas, SoftLayer, an IBM Company, is the innovation leader in on-demand Dedicated and Cloud hosting. As the largest hosting company in the world, SoftLayer lets customers create dedicated, cloud, or seamlessly integrated computing environments leveraging the company's world-class data center facilities and network Points of Presence across the globe. SoftLayer integrates and automates all elements of its platform, empowering enterprises of any size with complete control, security, scalability, and ease-of-management via a leading Customer Portal and Open API. 
 
Job Description 
 
Reporting to the General Manager -- APAC, this role will be responsible for administrative activities related to payroll, HR, accounts payable, vendor relationships, and providing general organizational support. 
 
The primary focus of the role is the office in Victoria, although support to other offices may be required from time to time. 
 
The Office Manager will be responsible for the following duties: 
 
Maintenance of administrative, human resource policies and objectives in accordance with company objectives, ***including payroll processing and benefits 
Oversight of external accounting functions (i.e. accounts payable) 
Oversight of external vendors (e.g., payroll, ) 
Maintenance of administrative, human resource (HR) policies and objectives in accordance with company objectives, including payroll processing, benefits and health and safety 
Oversight and maintenance of office supplies and equipment 
Overall administrative support of the team in Victoria 
Special projects and other related duties 
Candidate Requirements 
 
Candidacy for this position requires: 
 
Prior experience with HR, payroll processing, and accounts functions (Must have previous payroll experience) 
Must have exceptional verbal and written communications skills (English). 
Working knowledge of MS Office Suite (Excel, Word, PowerPoint, Outlook) 
Demonstrated multi-tasking ability and effective organizational skills in order to meet short deadlines with finite resources. 
Demonstrated successful advanced problem solving, negotiating, and analytical skills 
Must be able to work in Australia without sponsorship 
Job Location 
 
Melbourne, Victoria, Australia
title: Office Manager

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Responsibilities: 
 
• Secure appointments/meetings through inbound and outbound calls to acquire new prospects 
 
• Close sales through inbound and outbound calls to acquire new sales 
 
• Close sales through inbound and outbound calls to upsell and cross-sell existing customers 
 
• Keep close track of leads and conduct follow ups with customers for closure of sales 
 
• Report to the Sales & Business Development Manager 
 
 
 
Job Description 
 
• Ability to speak in Chinese 
 
• Deliver prepared sales talks, reading from scripts that describe products or services, or improvise, in order to persuade potential customers to take a desired action eg. agree to an appointment for presentation or purchase a product or service. 
 
• Schedule appointments for sales representatives to meet prospective customers or for customers to attend sales presentations or workshops. 
 
• Explain products or services and prices, and answer questions from potential customers. 
 
• Obtain potential customer information such as name, address, email, and contact numbers. 
 
• Obtain names and telephone numbers of potential customers from sources such as internet directories, telephone directories, trade directories, and lists purchased from other organizations. 
 
• Telephone or write email letters to correspondence with potential customers or to follow up initial sales contacts. 
 
• Documenting and recording information like entering, transcribing, recording, storing, or maintaining information of customers. 
 
• Maintain records of contacts, accounts, and new opportunities/leads created. 
 
• Conduct client or market surveys in order to obtain information about potential customers. 
 
• Contact existing customers to promote cross-sell or up-sell of companies' products and services. 
 
• Maintains phone time or sales quotas as determined by management 
 
 
SMS interest to Keagan @ 93526073, Preferably Locals and ability to converse in Chinese
title: Administrator / Personal Assistant

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
We are a fastest growing dance studio in Singapore, and we have been opened for 7 years now. We have got more and more famous through Mediacorp TV talent show and interviews, interviews by magazines and newspapers. We are also recognized as a fasting growing make up training studio. Our mission is to bring dance fitness & healthy lifestyle, beauty and style to girls and women from all walks of life. Bring out the best in our clients, health and beauty inside out. As business is expanding, we need a full-time admin executive to be at our front desk, as the first smile to our clients.   
   
1. You must be bilingual.   
  
2. You must also know basic Microsoft computer skills.  
  
3. Able to work from Mondays to Thursdays between 11:30am-2:30pm and 5:30-9:30 and Sat is 9am-8:30pm, Sun 9am-5:30am, Friday is off day. In-between the lessons when there are no classes, flexible breaks up to a few hours are allowed during these gaps too.  
  
4. You must have a pleasant personality, enjoying socializing with people in a friendly and respectful way, extremely patient with our clients, capable to handle emergency situation at the front desk, provide a worry-free teaching environment for the dance instructors.  
  
5. Administration or sales experience is a bonus factor for the applicant. Passion in dance and fitness business are a must too.  
  
Salary and off days  
Training will be provided once you are hired. Probationary period will be 3 months.   
  
1. 1500 SGD basic salary for Probationary period (3 months), after that is 1700 SGD for the basic salaries.  Commissions and Bonus will be from 100 SGD to 500 SGD depending on the performance of the applicant. Future career development possibility will be provided periodically according to the performance of the applicant.   
2. 14 days or more off days during the year according to the studio operating days. 5 days of MC or Emergency leaves.   
3. Can take any dance or yoga classes whenever no more students need registration or other assistance.
title: fast growing dance studio needs a happy admin front desk lady :)

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
Foreign-based Operations-MANAGER/Phone-Sales-Operator/VA needed for Las Vegas Cleaning Company/Investor/Author 
 
PENN ENTERPRISES currently has one full time, LONG STANDING (more than 5 years) Ops Manager/ Salesman and is looking for another amazing remote worker! The company is owned by Dillon and his wife Venza.  
 
The Work: 
Cleaning Company Management- 
We average 50 hours of phone time per month (which will be split between the 2 operators). You would be the 2nd operator. A little more than half of the calls are inbound, in which the operator must use their excellent sales skills to book the client for as much business as possible (within their budget). The other half of the calls relate mainly to managing the 6 (current , and 9 optimal) cleaners and their current appointments, as well as doing customer service and collecting payment. The manager will also be helping to write and rewrite procedural documents and analyze statistics to make suggestions that help the company to run more efficiently/profitably. This is our main income source and the initial training period will be focused solely on the Cleaning Company. As time goes on the time dispersion will look more like the attached figure.  
Investment Company- 
We have bought and sold about 30 buildings over the past 10 years, we currently own 3 apartment buildings, and are in the process of buying a 4th. Our candidate will also be operating as a VA to help us do property research, contact sellers, and to manage our current tenants as well as schedule repairs with our various contractors or our main maintenance person. 
Books/info products-  
The 1st book in the series of 5 books has already been written. The books are based on dating and relationship advice. Our VA will be assisting in contacting publishers, setting up workshops, marketing the books and info products, and anything else needed.  
 
The Best Candidate: 
-Our best candidate is probably an expat, or someone NOT living in the USA, preferably in a country with a low cost of living. We are specifically looking to outsource to a country where things are less expensive so that we can secure a long standing, super competent, worker and pay them more than they can usually make in their country of origin, at a price that supports us investing as much money as possible back into the company to grow it as fast as possible. As we grow, we will plan to raise up our foreign workers along with our success and let them become the pillars of the company.  
-Either English is your First Language, OR, you are completely bilingual. Accents must be either non existent, or if one is detectable, it must never cause miscommunications with our house cleaning clients or cleaners (both of which are costly). Someone who used to live in an English speaking country or was raised speaking English is ideal. 
Applicant Must: 
-Be able to quickly learn our procedures, computer systems, as well as the geographic area and cultural nuances of Las Vegas. 
-Have Management experience. The ability to be direct (in your speech) to cleaners about what they need to do, and compel them to follow their commitments on appointments is critical.  
-Have phone experience. This means you had a job in which you were on the phone for much of your workday.  
-Have Quick Transactional Sales experience. 
-Have Excellent problem solving skills. 
-have Positive attitude and outlook on life.  
 
 
The Pay:  
 
UP to $1,500USD  40 hours a week. There will likely be a 3 month probation period, depending on the candidate. We also have bonuses based on the gross income of the cleaning company.  
 
 
To APPLY:  
Go to this link www.proficientclean.com/APP
title: Operations-MANAGER/Phone-Sales-Operator/VA

For those looking for a part time job that is not a 9 to 5 desk bound work, perhaps you may want to read through my ad. 
 
I am employing part time telemarketers who are experienced in making cold calls and can work at flexible office hours at their own choice of workplace. 
The requirements for the incumbent are as follows : 
 
1. Able to converse in good English 
2. Need to commit a maximum of 8 hours in a week 
3. Experienced in making cold calls to SMEs and MNCs, relating to office renovation works 
4. Able to use MS Excel to key in details from each company 
5. Can choose to work anywhere as long as KPI log report is submitted on a weekly basis 
6. Able to start immediately 
 
Remuneration is based on : 
 
1. $6 per hour (maximum of $48 per week) with a minimum of 60 completed KPI 
2. Telephone allowance provided (based on $5 per week) 
3. Incentives are given for every successful appointment made 
 
A transcript will be provided and a telephone interview will be conducted to ensure that the candidate is suitable for this position. This part time position is recommended for those who do not enjoy the typical office hours' job and not bind to any associations.  
 
For interested parties, kindly email me for more details.
title: Looking for Part Time Telemarketers

postingbody:
QR Code Link to This Post 
  
 
This job is suitable for the following: 
1. NSFs, must be stay-out personnel 
2. Full-timers looking for a second source of income 
3. Homemakers looking to monetise their time spent at home 
4. Retirees  
5. Self-employed people looking to supplement their irregular income 
6. People who are finding a legitimate way to make money trading the financial markets 
 
Truths about this job: 
1. It is trading, so of course you need money to make money. 
2. If you start off with the minimum trading amount of 250 USD, you are looking to make about 250-500 USD  a month. If you start off with 1000 USD, you are looking to make 1000 USD-2000 USD a month. Start less, earn less, start more, earn more.  
3. If you are looking for overnight richness, sorry please do not contact me you are wasting my time. 
 
For starters, I strongly recommend this as a part-time/supplement income. It can earn you up to 1000 SGD a month. For people who are professional in trading, there is no limit on how much you can earn, but it takes hard work. 
 
If you are interested, please Whatsapp me at 97859692 and state 
1. name/age/craigslist02 
2. What is your attitude towards trading?
title: Independent forex trader
